name: skip :ohno: (@skipcloud@inane.chat)
summary:
Our sidekiq workers had a bit of trouble and weren’t processing jobs which resulted in no posts from other instances being processed for a couple of days.

The realisation of “oh, I guess that would be one of us that needs to fix that” was fun 😅

Gone are the days of just hoping an engineer in the SRE team at Big Social Media Company will wake up and fix it.

#MastoAdmin
